title: Jewels Saga
features: Simple,but still need a lot of skill.
description: If you like play pop games, like Pop Star or Jewels Maze.Jewels Saga is very suitable for you.Gorgeous interface.Suitable difficulty.It is a very interesting game.Once you play, you can't stop!The play rule is the simple,but you still need a lot of skill.You will like this game and challenge the highest score.How to Play:Just tap on two or more adjacent jewel to destroy them.There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage.You can save your progress at any time.
